name: Haoyang
personal background:
• I am currently an Assistant Professor (Research) at the Department of Computing at .
• I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Engineering from , advised by  in 2023, 
• Prior to that, I received my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Technology from the ACM Honor Class at , advised by  in 2018, <Haoyang Li is a researcher with experience in systems, specifically in graph neural networks and knowledge base population. His background includes PC membership for prominent conferences like WWW 2025 and ICDE 2025, and reviewer roles for top-tier journals like TKDE and TOIS. He has also presented at notable conferences such as NeurIPS 2022 and CIKM 2021, and is involved in academic service beyond his research work.>

recruitment:
<Position Opening>
• Self-motivated full-time Research Assistants (RAs) with strong coding skills are seeked. Part-time RA positions are NOT available.
• The PhD positions starting from 2025/09 or later are now open. The admitted PhD candidate will be supervised by myself and our department head Prof. Qing Li.
• Self-motivated undergraduate and master's students with strong coding skills (from PolyU, mainland universities, etc.), who are interested in our research topics, are also welcome. These students will be given priority consideration for PhD opportunities.
• MSc students at PolyU who seek a dissertation supervisor. Only 1-2 quotas are available now (2024/9/25).
</Position Opening>
